name: A Gridful Life
description:
We advice AGAINST using FULLSCREEN

This game isn't optimized for fullscreen so UI elements and other stuff doesn't work as intended.

"A Gridgful Life" is a game where you play as an android, bound to a grid, on a spaceship somewhere out in the wide open space.

You, WB-1225, have to complete different task for Karl, your manager. You also have an AI spectating you and telling you what you have to do.

But do you really want to stay on this grid for the rest of your life?

Controlls:

  • W,A,S,D / Arrow Keys - Moving around
  • Left Click - Pickup and place boxes (Level 2) / Shoot your gun (Level 3)
  • F - Place / Use you portal (Level 4)
